login.title: Welcome Back

signup.title: Create an Account
signup.description: Get started with HireSight in seconds.

hero.subtitle: HireSight leverages cutting-edge AI to deeply analyze resumes and job descriptions, providing you with unparalleled insights to make smarter, data-driven hiring decisions.

features.title: Why Choose HireSight?
features.subtitle: Our platform is designed to streamline your hiring process from start to finish.

advancedAI.title: Advanced AI Analysis
advancedAI.description: Utilizes multiple state-of-the-art LLMs including Gemini, GPT-4o, and Claude 3 for nuanced and accurate insights.

fastAnalysis.title: Instant, In-Depth Reports
fastAnalysis.description: Go from job description to comprehensive candidate report in seconds, not hours.

secureData.title: Data Privacy First
secureData.description: Your data is yours. We provide a secure environment without storing your sensitive documents.

compatibilityScore.title: Objective Scoring
compatibilityScore.description: Get an unbiased, data-driven compatibility score to quickly rank and compare candidates.

detailedReports.title: Actionable Insights
detailedReports.description: Reports include skill gaps, culture fit analysis, and AI-generated interview questions.

multipleAnalyses.title: Multi-Stage Analysis
multipleAnalyses.description: Analyze initial applications, generate pre-interview decisions, and assess interview consistency all in one place.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage API Keys
